parameters.name: HostAddress
parameters.description: The address of the host that you want to query. You can set this parameter to a domain name or an IP address. Only exact match is supported.

parameters.name: HostName
parameters.description: The name of the host that you want to query. Only exact match is supported.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the ID of the bastion host.

parameters.name: OSType
parameters.description:
The operating system of the host that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **Linux**
*   **Windows**

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.\
Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
The source of the host that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **Local**
*   **Ecs**

parameters.name: SourceInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance. Exact match is supported.

parameters.name: SourceInstanceState
parameters.description:
The status of the host that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **Normal**
*   **Release**
